// src/components/AboutUs.js import React from 'react'; import '../styles/AboutUs.css'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About Us

We believe travel should be inspiring, unforgettable, and effortless.

Our Mission

At VM Trips, our mission is to make travel accessible, customized, and magical. We craft experiences that let travelers explore the world with comfort and confidence — whether it's a luxury retreat, a cultural exploration, or an offbeat adventure.

Our Vision

To become the most trusted and loved travel platform — where every journey is more than just a destination, it's a story worth sharing.

Core Values

  • Passion for Travel: We live and breathe exploration.
  • Customer Delight: Our guests come first, always.
  • Innovation: We embrace technology to deliver better experiences.
  • Integrity: Transparent and ethical in every interaction.
  • Sustainability: Travel with respect to people and planet.

Our Journey

2019

VM Trips was founded by two passionate travelers in Gujarat, India.

2020

Overcame the pandemic and launched virtual travel experiences and local tours.

2022

Expanded services to 7 countries and hit 10,000 happy travelers.

2024

Launched our mobile app and introduced AI-powered trip planning.

); }; export default AboutUs;
